title: Discover News Feed sometimes get stuck in blank screen
content:
Hello!
When using the google news feed (the very left page of the home screen) and I select a news entry and then want to go back it often just doesnt go back or sometimes just shows a blank screen 

I've already tried to boot into safe mode, still happens; also I've done a factory reset.
I'm using a Pixel 3XL with Android 11 and the newest updates.

(see here:
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
